snippet.title: Citadale - The Accursed Seal | Official METROIDVANIA Game Trailer (Steam)
snippet.description:
Citadale - The Accursed Seal is the epic conclusion to the Arion Dorleac Trilogy, and it’s bigger and better than ever! Journey back to Citadale Castle under the blood moon, where Arion must lift a deadly curse before the next full moon—or perish.

Explore a vast, interconnected world filled with beautiful forests, dark caverns, and bustling towns. Fight terrifying monsters, uncover secrets, and upgrade your character through optional quests. But beware: when night falls, the world transforms. Monsters grow stronger, ghosts haunt the land, and townsfolk hide in their homes, leaving you to fend for yourself.

With a dynamic day/night cycle, multiple endings, and atmospheric music, Citadale - The Accursed Seal delivers a thrilling Metroidvania experience. Can you defeat the creatures binding Rhogul’s spirit to this world, collect the four sacred flames, and break the curse before time runs out?

Key Features:
- Huge world to explore with diverse environments
- Character upgrades and optional quests
- Dynamic day/night cycle that changes gameplay
- Multiple endings based on your choices
- Atmospheric soundtrack that immerses you in the world

Available now on Steam and itch.io!
👉https://store.steampowered.com/app/2597360/Citadale__The_Accursed_Seal/
👉https://ermedia.itch.io/citadale6
